name: publication-pipeline-enhancement
description: Comprehensive enhancement of analysis pipeline to produce rigorous, publication-quality figures, tables, and statistical outputs suitable for academic papers

metadata.objective: Enhance analysis pipeline for publication-quality output
metadata.outcome: Successfully implemented all 6 work packages across 6 PRs with comprehensive test coverage
work_packages: WP1: Statistical Foundation (stats functions, table workflows, statsmodels)
WP2: New Tables (summary stats, config, normality tests)
WP3: New Figures (effect sizes, correlations, diagnostics)
WP4: Remove Hardcoded Values (color palettes, parameterization)
WP5: Enhanced Data Export (rich statistics, statistical_results.json)
WP6: LaTeX Figure Support (auto-generate inclusion snippets)
metadata.test_coverage: 100+ tests across stats, tables, figures, and export
